What we did Working principles

Motivation - Insight #5

Risk is seen a ‘dry’, ‘difficult’ and ‘boring’

We believe...

People’s preconceived views and opinions about risk, that it’s boring, unnecessary and dry is a barrier to the adoption of a risk management tool and process.

Because we've seen and heard...

As soon as Risk Management becomes a chore, people stop doing it

Risk is seen as ‘negative’ or as a ‘dry subject’. It just means more work

I have to explain why it is important before someone understands why they should do it
